topic.title: Freedom of Speech? You are Welcome at Dogola-chan!
topic.body: Want freedom of speech? Visit us on the Onion network at http://dogolachhhnaqa7n.onion/int/index.html

1550616097_1J7BZnp2xmjByBDG3z9UUtXv22pnQ.body:
> [gluek](#comment_7_1LsU5cS8D3qjVLzgdwtcfdXtHEY8T2Gixi): Why should we instead of using ZeroNet here? :)

JavaScript is not needed there. Static HTML is just a lot nicer.
